name: vue-circular-progress-bar
description: A component to indicate a progress in the form of a donut-shaped bar

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify src/CircularProgressBar.vue | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > dist/circular-progress-bar.js
scripts.example: cross-env NODE_ENV=production browserify -g envify example/example.js | uglifyjs -c warnings=false -m > example/example.min.js

author: Tino Groteloh
